body: May I ask for gitian builds?

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18149 (build: add --enable-isystem and change --enable-werror to enable -Werror by vasild)
* #16883 (WIP: Qt: add QML based mobile GUI by icota)
* #15706 (build: Check QT library version by lucayepa)
* #15112 (build: Optionally enable -Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant by Empact)
* #14920 (Build: enable -Wdocumentation via isystem by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Updated f71b56047bc319184c1f771e0757faeff26cf242 -> e7cfcf79ea9992e2b844ffdcd64ee02af4f9fc07 ([pr18297.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr18297.01) -> [pr18297.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr18297.02), [compare](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr18297.01..pr18297.02)):

- removed redundant `include` and `lib` tracking for MinGW in `config.site`
